title: LIC Housing Finance eyes lower double digit loan portfolio growth in FY25
description: LIC Housing Finance targets "lower double-digit" loan portfolio growth this fiscal, focusing on affordable housing, says MD Tribhuwan Adhikari. March saw a 4.3% y-o-y loan portfolio rise to Rs 2.87 lakh crore. Annual loan disbursement dropped 8% to Rs 58,937 crore, partly due to cautious lending amid competition from other lenders.
